Title: Axel Holm to Alma C. Wilson
Description: NOEN LINJER FRA AXEL HOLM, UDATERT.  TIL ALMA.
Creator: Axel Holm
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Alma.

Ja så er broder Johan hjemme hos Herren  han har nokk nu treft min Helga.  Sender dere nogle aviser.  der finner di et minde ord om ham.  lev vel alle.  og ver hilset fra oss alle

Axel


Alma.

Well now brother Johan is at home with the Lord  he has probably met my Helga now.  Am sending you some newspapers.  there you’ll find a few words in his memory.  live well all of you.  and be greeted from us all

Axel
